column4: If you are currently using GDM and want to switch to KDM, just do this: "sudo dpkg-reconfigure gdm"  And do vice-versa if you are currently using KDM...
But I personally can't recommend "startupmanager" at this point.
What do you mean? I tried StartupManager and did not have a good experience with it, so I gave up on it.
i like suses graphical good looking grub menu...
